children.name: destroy
children.description: Prepares the **DetailButton** for safe removal from DOM. Detaches all event handlers and removes jQuery.data attributes to avoid memory leaks. Calls destroy method of any child Kendo widgets.> **Important:** This method does not remove the DetailButton element from DOM.

children.name: Initialize Kendo mobile DetailButton based on role data attribute
